title: SOTRU - State of the Re:Union Evergreen Promo
teaser: In one town, it might be an oil spill. "I should not have seen three dead dolphins in my lifetime. And I've seen em." In another, saving a basketball team, "That tweet I sent out in a sense was, the spark that ignited this city." In another, AIDS activism, "if it takes me to talk to everybody in the world one person at a time, that is what I will do." All across the country, people are taking on their communities problems. Join us for stories from around the country. That's on this season of State of the Re:Union.
